mapper.insert: insert into STUDYBOARD values (sb_num_seq.nextval, #{member_name, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{sb_title, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{sb_tag, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{sb_content, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{sb_start_time, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{sb_deadLine, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{sb_contact, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, sysdate)
